author: rsw33n3y
title: AI Resolution of Smart Contracts
description: Resolving smart contracts often depends on centralized data sources, non-experts & those with conflicting incentives.
solution: Use AI (particularly ML) to evolve models for oracle data selection and verification with timely resolution and correctness incentives.
experience: Global team of professionals with experience in Software Development, DeFi, Betting, Machine Learning and Blockchain. See betallin.io
